caller_intent: Debbie Holbrook needs a certificate of insurance emailed to the town of Elkin to confirm Holbrook Plumbing Company has general liability, workers compensation, and commercial package coverage.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the request for a certificate of insurance.
Agent offers to transfer the caller to the commercial insurance department for assistance.
knowledge_required: Understanding certificate of insurance requests for commercial clients
Internal transfer protocols for specialized insurance departments
summary: Debbie Holbrook from Holbrook Plumbing Company requested a certificate of insurance for general liability and workers compensation coverage. The agent offered to transfer her to the commercial insurance team to fulfill the request.
